Downloading BLAST and use it to compare unknown sequences.

```{bash}

cd /home/jovyan/applications
curl -O https://ftp.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/blast/executables/blast+/LATEST/ncbi-blast-2.16.0+-aarch64-linux.tar.gz
tar -xf ncbi-blast-2.16.0+-aarch64-linux.tar.gz

```

``` {bash}
/home/jovyan/applications/ncbi-blast-2.16.0+/bin/blastx -h

```
